sourcesContent: import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Col, Row, FormGroup, Button, Input, Label, Dropdown, DropdownItem, DropdownMenu, DropdownToggle, } from 'reactstrap'; class TenderQuo extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.toggle = this.toggle.bind(this); this.state = { activeTab: '1', dropdownOpen: new Array(6).fill(false), }; } toggle(tab) { if (this.state.activeTab !== tab) { this.setState({ activeTab: tab, }); } } toggleDrop(tab) { const newArray = this.state.dropdownOpen.map((element, index) => { return (index === tab ? !element : false); }); this.setState({ dropdownOpen: newArray, }); } render() { return ( { this.toggleDrop(0); }}> --Select-- Company One Company Two Company Three Company Four Company Five Company Six { this.toggleDrop(1); }}> --Select-- Person One Person Two Person Three { this.toggleDrop(2); }}> --Select-- Person One Person Two Person Three { this.toggleDrop(4); }}> --Select-- Person One Person Two Person Three { this.toggleDrop(4); }}> --Select-- Person One Person Two Person Three { this.toggleDrop(2); }}> --Select-- Person One Person Two Person Three { this.toggleDrop(4); }}> --Select-- Person One Person Two Person Three { this.toggleDrop(4); }}> --Select-- Person One Person Two Person Three { this.toggleDrop(2); }}> --Select-- Person One Person Two Person Three { this.toggleDrop(4); }}> --Select-- Person One Person Two Person Three { this.toggleDrop(4); }}> --Select-- Person One Person Two Person Three ); } } export default TenderQuo;
